alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 16 at 1:14PM HST until January 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY FOR HIGHEST SUMMITS OF THE BIG ISLAND AND HALEAKALA ON MAUI... ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH 6 PM HST FOR PORTIONS OF KAUAI AND OAHU... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MIDNIGHT HST TONIGHT FOR NIIHAU MOLOKAI LANAI AND PORTIONS OF OAHU AND KAUAI AND FOR LOWER ELEVATIONS ON MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .South to southwest winds will increase quickly to advisory levels by mid to late morning and continue through this evening as a cold front approaches from the west. Southwest winds will also increase to warning levels across the high summits of the Big Island and Haleakala on Maui this morning and continue through Wednesday. ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with localized gusts TO 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of interior and windward Kauai and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured properly.
